Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A frame that constrains its child to a particular aspect ratio.

remarks.para: The AspectFrame is useful when you want pack a widget so that it can resize but always retains the same aspect ratio. For instance, one might be drawing a small preview of a larger image. AspectFrame derives from , so it can draw a label and a frame around the child. The frame will be "shrink-wrapped" to the size of the child.
